title: OGC WFS
description:
The OGC WFS focuses on exchanging vector data. This component provides an OGC-certified implementation of version 1.0.0 and 1.1.0, and includes support for Locking and Transactions.

The base URL is available at {{servletLocation}}/LuciadOGCServices/wfs?.

A few example requests can be triggered via the buttons below.
